reviews.review: The suspense the genius story and everything is amazing so far
It's half-life 2, whats not to like

Dear Valve, I want to say THANK YOU for making a VERY FUN GAME!! Over the past 12 years, I have made great memories playing HL2. You've also helped me in the saddest parts of my life, like when my Grandpa and I used to have fun watching each other play HL2. We were VERY close. i don't really do much Online stuff (or even do Social media because it\s TOO TOXIC!!) Anyway, I just wanna thank you for helping me make fun memories and wish you luck.
Some of the psychics puzzles might be a bit cryptic in my opinion but this game is still action packed and has aged tremendously
One of the great classics, still great to play, definitely a must play if you havent.
A well-produced sequel that so far does justice to a fantastic game
One of my all time favorites!

Honestly there really is not any other game that comes close to capturing the feel and experience that Half-Life 2 brings. A depressing yet rich atmosphere, a gripping story, a beautiful world that still holds up 16 years later, and throughout it all you play as a theoretical physicist that barrages enemies with a variety of unique guns, a crowbar, and a gravity-gun that allows you to pick up objects and fling them at enemies (my personal favorite). If you have not played this game yet, you're missing out on one of the best FPS experiences of all time.

there is nothing more homoerotic and depressing than barney holding onto gordon's crowbar for 20 years, giving it back to him, fighting striders alongside him while yelling positive and heartwarming things to gordon, but not even being able to say goodbye to his gay lover from M.I.T.  before gordon's crowbar gets zapped forever and gordon escapes into the old, wrinkled hands of g-man.
es realmente el juego mas divertido que e jugado hasta ahora de valve la historia es impresionante y supera con creces a 1
Fantasic FPS from VALVe's Golden Age. Great game that everyone should experience. 11/10 would Crowbar again.
Loved the original half-life way back on the ps2 when i played it, i love half life 2. the story is amazing and it has that classic game play style to it that you just don't see anymore.

Half-Life 2 von Valve ist und bleibt ein nicht wegzudenkender Meilenstein in der Computerspielegeschichte. Ein Ego-Shooter der ganz besonderen Art. Eine packende Story und unbeschreibliche Physik. Volle Kaufempfehlung. Vorallem nach dem Ende vom neuen VR-Spiel Half-Life Alyx ist dieses Universum wieder voll in Fahrt und interessanter denn je. 
Danke Valve, danke Steam, danke Gordon Freeman
This is my favorite game, out of all the games I've played.
Wooow how could i missed i didnt play this game.... one of the best game ever made .. Excellent valve .. 10/10.
its fucking hl2 what do i nead to say

This game is by far the best one and it was far away from its time the game felt like it was made in 2012 i can say that its 10/10 i would play it again its been in my childhood i just really like to get some nostalgic time get this game on sales summer or winter sales just spent some nostalgic on it
Muy Bueno el juego me gusta mas la parte de manejar la lancha jajaja buena experiencia lo recomiendo LOL

This game really is a masterpiece. I haven't felt this way about a game since ages, you know? I remember when I went to the video store with my mom to rent a game and it was one of the best games I've ever played. This game brought back that feeling. I know I'm extremely late, but, thank you Valve. Thank you for bringing back happiness.
Will never exist a game better then half life.

Best game ever, obviously a must play. If you haven't played yet, do it scrub.

One of the best games ever made in one of the best game franchises ever made!! Not to mention its is one of my most favorite games i've ever played.  10/10 would definitely recommend!! LOVE this game to death!!
fun puzzles and amazing physics. great game if you want a fun campain that is a first person shooter
It's half-life 2 why wouldn't I like it.

One of the best FPS titles of all time, bar none. Worth a revisit for old fans, and if you're new to the series it still holds up surprisingly well with a robust narrative and world that pulls you in along with great shooting mechanics. But the real selling point here is the story line and the world building that draws you in for hours.
this game is a dude moment
muito bom o jogo, o melhor de ttodos os tempos
MUCH better than the first. Definitely worth full price, but it goes on sale for like, a buck during most big events.

Half-Life 2 is a truly amazing FPS: If you've played HL1, you'll love it, and if you haven't played it, you'll still love HL2. This game has tons of fun physics puzzles and when you figure them out on your own it feels very satisfying. The gameplay is great, you have a nice selection of weapons and the story is amazing.
One of the best shooters out there

Amazing game, uses chalenging gameplay to use puzzles in the enviroment
jocul are niste continuari interesante,jocul asta a fost amintire din copilaria mea,e o placere sa-l joci,recomand sa-l jucati.

What are you doing with your life if you play PC games and you haven't played this? This game universe raised a generation of video game lovers. It shook and inspired the entire industry surrounding it spanning all the way from the first Half-Life release and its influence is still seen in titles today

If you can make it through this game... even in 2020... and it doesn't raise your standards or expectations of story driven shooters... or if it doesn't make you want more and more of this universe... or if it doesn't move or affect you on some emotional level... then you are dead inside.

The passage of time has left this absolute rock of a game untarnished. The passion put into Half-Life 2 bleeds out from every corner. The story grips at your heart, the gameplay is pure (no grinds or exp needed), and if you want to play the best of the best then Half-Life 2 needs to be in your library.

Get this game and jam it into your eye holes already. Stop reading reviews to decide, fuck you, buy it.

I mean what is there to say about this game that hasn't been said already. I liked the combat, am a CS fan so the shooting was pretty satisfiying. I liked the puzzles. The story is good. Can't wait to keep going.

My god.
This is one of the best games I've ever played.
From the well-known G-Man speech at the start of the game to blowing up the Citadel,I enjoyed every part of this game. Even Ravenholm,which even though scared the hell out of me,was a bloody masterpiece.
The graphics hold up pretty well for a game released in 2004 in my opinion,which is incredible.
If you never played this game, I don't know what in the world you're waiting for: Just. Play. It
I doubt that you will not enjoy this game.
Its a classic FPS.  Highly recommended to play thru at least once.  Physics are good , any current vid card should play it well.  AI is dated but still challenging on the hard level.
A classic PC game that virtually everyone owns!
C'mon. If you're still trying to figure out if you should get this game, then you need to just stop and buy it. It's totally worth your money and a truly great successor to the original
